title: mnoforms : Specification for a Form field
description: The standard form field definition specification for MNO Forms

meta.description: Anything extra should be added here. Let's not compromise the schema

name.description: The field name and key, should be machine friendly without spaces or special characters

type.description: The field type. The implementation of the field can be subjected to the form engine, hence this field should not necessarily define the HTML rendering

attributes.description: The data attributes other than custom validations

is_null.description: Can the field have null values

default.description: The default value. @todo: how to cover differnet data types in case of default handling

label.description: The display label of the choice
The display label. can contain spaces and special characters

validators.description: List of validators to apply to this field

function.description: The validator function / type to be executed.  The implementation of the validator can be subjected to the form engine

message.description: The error message to display if the validation fails. The validator implementation can use this message or ignore it and use its own message

options.description: Validator options required by the validator if any during the initialization

extras.description: Extra options for the field, for the form engine to use.
